wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Michael Cooke (born 30 May 1997) is an English cricketer. He made his first-class debut on 28 March 2017 for Durham MCCU against Gloucestershire as part of the Marylebone Cricket Club University fixtures. He made his List A debut on 22 July 2021, for Glamorgan in the 2021 Royal London One-Day Cup. On 16 August 2021, in the semi-final of the tournament, Cooke took his first five-wicket haul in List A cricket.Cooke studied at Durham University.
